definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Life is like a one-arm bandit…
Actual slot machines are far more complicated, and balancing the payout is tricky.
sentences.chinese: 實際的老虎機要複雜得多，並且結算獎金十分棘手。

sentences.english: It doesn't matter how long it takes you for--to do it.
sentences.chinese: 你玩了多久老虎機，並不重要。

sentences.english: Let’s put some money into the slot machine.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們往老虎機裏放一些錢。

sentences.english: This test simulates a user losing then winning with the slot machine.
sentences.chinese: 這個測試模擬了一個用戶在老虎機上先輸後贏的情形。

sentences.english: His coins all slotted into the slot machine.
sentences.chinese: 他所有的硬幣塞給了老虎機。

sentences.english: Racetracks and perhaps airports could have slot machines.
sentences.chinese: 這就有可能在賽車場或者飛機場都設有老虎機。

sentences.english: Server-based slots are still in a minority but growing fast.
sentences.chinese: 基於服務器的老虎機現在仍屬少數，不過增長迅猛。

sentences.english: Their appeal lies in their utter simplicity. You do not need to understand a complex system of betting, as in craps.
sentences.chinese: 老虎機的魅力在於其徹底的簡單明瞭。

sentences.english: Now let’s write a simple test to render the slot machine.
sentences.chinese: 現在讓我們寫一個簡單的測試，生成老虎機。

sentences.english: Life is like a one-arm bandit…You never know what you're gonna get.
sentences.chinese: 生活就象一臺老虎機，你永遠不知道會蹦出什麼來。

sentences.english: So, for example, a slot machine is variable ratio.
sentences.chinese: 例如，老虎機就是變化比率強化。

sentences.english: Traditional slot machines offer only one game.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的老虎機只有一種遊戲方式。

sentences.english: You never know what you are gonna get.
sentences.chinese: 生活就像一臺老虎機，你永遠都不知道會磞出什麼來。

sentences.english: Play mobile slot machine with Lion Seven slot machine.
sentences.chinese: 獅子七老虎機播放移動角子機。

definition: private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
(computing) transcoding/to convert (from one encoding to another)
Gundam, Japanese animation franchise/Jean-Luc Godard (1930-), French-Swiss film director
